response: "{ \"title\": \"Easy: Array Median\", \"description\": \"Find the median of an array of integers. The median is the middle value if there are an odd number of elements, and the average of the two middle values if there are an even number of elements.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```\\ndef find_median(arr: list[int)) -> int:\\n``` \\n\\n#### Input\\n- `arr` (list[int]): A list of integers.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the median of the input array.\\n\", \"code\": \"def find_median(arr: list[int)) -> int:\\n    arr.sort()\\n    n = len(arr)\\n    if n % 2 == 1:\\n        return arr[n // 2]\\n    else:\\n        mid1 = arr[(n - 1) // 2]\\n        mid2 = arr[n // 2]\\n        return (mid1 + mid2) // 2\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert find_median([1, 3, 5]) == 3\", \"assert find_median([-1, 0, 1]) == 0\", \"assert find_median([10, 9, 8, 7, 6]) == 7\", \"assert find_median([]) == None\"] }"
